mission.label: Mission:
mission.description: Offer people living with avoidant patterns a kinder way to challenge harsh thoughts.

whatIs.label: What it is:
whatIs.description: A tool that uses ideas from cognitive restructuring to help you spot thinking traps — like catastrophizing or mind-reading — and explore kinder perspectives.

whatIsnt.label: What it isn't:
whatIsnt.description: Not psychotherapy, medical advice, or a crisis service.

creator.title: Motivation:
creator.content: The motivation behind re-frame is simple: to make it easier for anyone to challenge unhelpful thoughts with kindness and curiosity.
